class.name: NSWConfigApplication
class.description: NSW Configuration Application that configures FE for multiple swROD

attribute.name: resetVMM
attribute.description: Will reset vmm right before configuring it. A fail-safe mechanism.

attribute.name: resetTDS
attribute.description: Will reset TDS SER, logic, ePLL after configuring normally.

attribute.name: maxThreads
attribute.description: Maximum number of threads for parallel FEB configuring.

attribute.name: dbConnection
attribute.description: Database connection string, depending on the starting word(json, xml, oracle), different ConfigReader APIs are used

attribute.name: DeviceID
attribute.description: The Device ID of this device on the Oracle Database

class.name: NSW_L1DDC

class.name: NSW_L1DDC_sFEB
class.description: NSW L1DDC Board configuration for the sFEB
